meanings.definition: A person who sells hardware, especially iron goods.
meanings.sent1: The friendly ironmongers helped me find the perfect nails for my project.
meanings.sent2: I visited the local ironmongers to buy a new set of tools.
meanings.sent3: The ironmongers joked that their store was so heavy because it was full of iron goods.
meanings.sent4: The ironmongers' shop was a treasure trove of metal wonders.
meanings.sent5: The clang of hammers echoed through the ironmongers' workshop.

meanings.definition: A shop or business that sells iron goods.
meanings.sent1: At the ironmongers, you can find all sorts of metal items for sale.
meanings.sent2: The old ironmongers in town has been around for generations.
meanings.sent3: The ironmongers' shop was so full of iron goods, it looked like a metal forest.
meanings.sent4: The ironmongers' store gleamed with polished metal objects.
meanings.sent5: The smell of iron filled the air as I entered the ironmongers' shop.
